snippet: Game 1 of the Yankees' division series, which will be either at Baltimore or at Texas, will start at 6:15 p.m. on Sunday. Game 2 is scheduled for 8:07 p.m. Monday, and both games will be televised on TBS.
abstract: Game 1 of the Yankees' division series, which will be either at Baltimore or at Texas, will start at 6:15 p.m. on Sunday. Game 2 is scheduled for 8:07 p.m. Monday, and both games will be televised on TBS.

headline.main: Game Times Are Set for First Two Yankees Games
